title: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in sugar tablespoon, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; 1 level tablespoon ≈12.5 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, packing density, and brand; refined sugars are similar but check labels for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of granulated sugar contains about 49 kcal, all from carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for simple sugars; totals are for the queried amount.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tablespoon of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 49 kcal for one level tablespoon of granulated white sugar.
Yes, 100% carbohydrates (12.5 g per tablespoon), all as simple sugars with no protein or fat.
Slightly higher at about 52 kcal due to molasses content.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a tablespoon?
faqs.a: About 12.5 g of sugar, equivalent to roughly 3 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Does sugar type affect calories much?
faqs.a: Minimal difference; white, brown, or cane sugar are all around 49–52 kcal per tablespoon.
